page.title: 17SHOPPING IN DYCE - 2
page.content: {______________________________________ {2. VICTORIA STREET { }Victoria Street is the old main road through the town. It has a number of{small shops}along it eg a Mace Supermarket, a newsagent (Forbouys). There are also banks and a hairdresser in the street. People we spoke to said they often shopped here and were locals or they were passing through and stopped to buy a newspaper or other small item because it was possible to park their car. It is also an important street for {old age pensioners}as they collect their pensions in the Mace which is also the Post Office. {______________________________________
